2DG.F.summary: Sivers Semiconductors AB, through its subsidiaries, develops, manufactures, and sells chips, components, modules, and subsystems. The company operates in two business areas, Wireless and Photonics. It provides products based on semiconductor technology for 5G millimeter wave networks, as well as optical semiconductors for fiber networks, wireless optical networks, and sensors. The company offers WiGig radio-frequency integrated circuits, radio frequency modules, evaluation kits and 5G NR mmWave system test platform for fixed wireless access, 5G mmWave Open RAN, V2X transport and track-to-train communication, mobile and WiFi meshed networks, and multi-gigabit wireless connectivity; and foundry services and laser products in wafer, coated bar, chip device, and die on tape formats. It serves customers in North America, Europe, and Asia. The company was formerly known as Sivers IMA Holding AB (publ) and changed its name to Sivers Semiconductors AB in October 2020. Sivers Semiconductors AB was founded in 1951 and is headquartered in Kista, Sweden.
